de.btu.openinfra.backend.db.daos

Class OpenInfraValueDao<TypePojo extends OpenInfraPojo,TypeModel extends OpenInfraModelObject,TypeModelValue>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.btu.openinfra.backend.db.daos.OpenInfraDao<TypePojo,TypeModel>
      • de.btu.openinfra.backend.db.daos.OpenInfraValueDao<TypePojo,TypeModel,TypeModelValue>
  • Type Parameters:
    TypePojo -
    TypeModel -
    TypeModelValue -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeTypeDao, AttributeValueGeomzDao, FilesProjectDao, OpenInfraValueValueDao, RelationshipTypeDao, SubjectObjectDao, TopicCharacteristicDao, TopicInstanceDao, ValueListValueDao, WebappProjectDao, WebappSubjectDao, WebappSystemDao

    public abstract class OpenInfraValueDao<TypePojo extends OpenInfraPojo,TypeModel extends OpenInfraModelObject,TypeModelValue>
extends OpenInfraDao<TypePojo,TypeModel>
    This class extends the OpenInfraDao class in order to provide another generic method which reads a list of JPA model objects by a given value. Using this class prerequisites a named query of the TypeModel object.
    Author:
    BTU DBIS

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenInfraValueDao

        protected OpenInfraValueDao(UUID currentProjectId,
                 OpenInfraSchemas schema,
                 Class<TypeModel> modelClass,
                 Class<TypeModelValue> valueClass)
        Mandatory constructor method which calls the super constructor.
        Parameters:
        currentProjectId - the current project id
        schema - the required schema
        modelClass - a specific class of the JPA model class object
        valueClass - a specific class of the JPA model value class object

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public List<TypePojo> read(Locale locale,
                  UUID valueId,
                  int offset,
                  int size)
        This is a generic method which reads a list of TypePojos defined by a specific UUID value (e.g. get a list of objects which belong to a specific object). This method presumes a corresponding named query of the TypeModel object.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale defined by request
        valueId - the specific id of the required value object
        offset - the number where to start
        size - the size of items to provide
        Returns:
        a list of objects of type POJO class which directly belong to the TypeModelValue class

      • createOrUpdate

        public UUID createOrUpdate(TypePojo pojo,
                  UUID firstAssociationId,
                  UUID firstAssociationIdFromPojo)
                    throws RuntimeException
        This method checks if the first associated id that is part of the URI matches with the association id in the POJO. If the matches are fulfilled the createOrUpdate method of the OpenInfraDao will be called. Otherwise it will return null.
        Parameters:
        pojo - the POJO object which should be stored in the database
        firstAssociationId - the first association id from the URI
        firstAssociationIdFromPojo - the first association id from the POJO
        Returns:
        the UUID of the newly created or replaced object or null
        Throws:
        RuntimeException

      • read

        public List<TypePojo> read(Locale locale,
                  UUID valueId,
                  OpenInfraSortOrder order,
                  OpenInfraOrderBy column,
                  int offset,
                  int size)
        This is a generic method which reads a list of TypePojos defined by a specific UUID value (e.g. get a list of objects which belong to a specific object). This method presumes a corresponding named query of the TypeModel object. It provides the possibility to sort the list.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale defined by request
        valueId - the specific id of the required value object
        order - the sort direction
        column - the column that should be used for sorting
        offset - the number where to start
        size - the size of items to provide
        Returns:
        a list of objects of type POJO class which directly belong to the TypeModelValue class

      • getCount

        public Long getCount(UUID valueId)
        This method returns the count of objects referring a specific object.
        Parameters:
        valueId - the specific object
        Returns:
        the count of objects or -1 if the value id doesn't exists
